, but rivals are nipping at its heels. The Chrysler Town and Country was the top-selling minivan in the U.S. last year, with sales of 112,275, or about 4,000 more than the Honda Odyssey. We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy.
